pkgmetadata.longdescription: # NowYou Grafits script python## Create new version to Pypi1. Increase version in `setup.py` file1. Build: `python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel`2. Upload: `python -m twine upload --skip-existing dist/*`### VirtualenvYou can use `pipenv` tool for development: - create virtualenv: `pipenv --python /path/to/python` - install dependencies: `pipenv lock && pipenv install` - open virtualenv shell: `pipenv shell` (optional)
